definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
mess hall for high-ranking cadres/(fig.) special treatment/cf. 大灶[da4 zao4]
lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path
Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen
Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen/also written 灶神
to be given special treatment/to be treated in a favored way
Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen/also written 灶神

sentences.english: Hydropic degeneration and focal necrosis can be found by microscope in the dosage groups.
sentences.chinese: 病理组织学检查，光镜下可见水样变性及小块坏死灶。

sentences.english: O-side focus is also related to the high southerly built during the ancient stove with similar Longyao.
sentences.chinese: 邻侧的高灶也是与南风古灶同年代建成的同类龙窑。

sentences.english: Conclusion: There is a great value of standard EEG on epileptogenic focus location.
sentences.chinese: 结论认为规范化EEG检查对定位致痫灶有较高价值。
包膜下可见黄褐色梗死灶。

sentences.english: Blasting gas stove with Two Head Stov.
There was no abnormal lesion of corpus callosum on CT images.
sentences.chinese: CT扫描胼胝体区均未见异常密度灶。

sentences.english: He went to the kitchen, filled a bowl with cold rice, added hot water to it, and sitting down started to eat.
sentences.chinese: 走到灶下，盛出一碗冷饭，泡上热水，坐下便吃。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a liquid-fuel range with a heat conducting ring.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种带有导热环的液体燃料灶。

sentences.english: There is focal atrophy of tubules seen here to the upper right.
sentences.chinese: 右上方可见生精小管的灶状萎缩。

sentences.english: I saw a cook cook a cock on a cooker.
sentences.chinese: 我看到了一个厨师在灶上炖鸡。

sentences.english: If accompanied with hepatic metastases, the primary tumor and hepatic metastases tumors should be resected simultaneously with efforts.
sentences.chinese: 对于有肝转移者应力争同时切除原发灶和转移灶。

sentences.english: Note the purplish blue calcifications in the media; note that the lumen is unaffected by this process.
sentences.chinese: 在动脉中膜可见紫蓝色的钙化灶，而管腔没有受累。

sentences.english: Metastatic foci in the axillary nodes maintain the morphology identical to the primary lesions.
sentences.chinese: 腋窝淋巴结癌转移灶保留原发灶的形态学特点。

sentences.english: Note that the two large lobules in the center contain microcalcifications.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是中央处两个大的小叶包含了小钙化灶。

sentences.english: The baffle wall developed from low to high;
sentences.chinese: 并且灶的挡火墙也由低到高发展。

sentences.english: Put a frying pan on the burner.

definition: large kitchen stove made from bricks or earth/(PRC) ordinary mess hall (lowest dining standard, ranked below 中灶[zhong1 zao4] for mid-level cadres and 小灶[xiao3 zao4] for the most privileged)
to light a fire for cooking
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
